snippet.title: Grapplers: Relic Rivals Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Grapplers: Relic Rivals is an upcoming 2D PvP platformer with grappling hooks!  Engage in exhilarating local PvP matches while unearthing ancient relics and harnessing their power to conquer your rivals. Dodge deadly traps, procure potent potions, activate mystical runes, and master each relic to defeat your opponents and reign victorious in this thrilling PvP platformer!

Grapplers: Relic Rivals will be releasing on Steam in summer 2024.  Wishlist it now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2906890/Grapplers_Relic_Rivals

"A wish to Fulfill" by Centurion_of_war, used under CC0 1.0
